english.segment1: When peace like a river. Attendeth my way. When sorrows like the sea billows roll
english.segment2: Whatever my lot. Thou hast taught me to say. It is well. It is well with my soul
english.segment3: (Chorus). It is well. With my soul. It is well. It is well with my soul
english.segment4: My sin, oh, the bliss of this glorious thought!. My sin, not in part but the whole, yeah. Is nailed to the cross, and I bear it no more, Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, O my soul!
english.segment6: And Lord, haste the day when my faith shall be saved. The clouds be rolled back as a scroll. The trumphed shall resound. And the Lord shall descend even so. It is well with my soul
